articles.title: SPA Chairman Meets German Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
SPA Chairman Meets German Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with German Ambassador to the DPRK Gerhard Thiedemann, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Djibouti
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Djibouti
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Ismail Omar Guelleh, president of Djibouti, on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of its independence.
					The message sincerely wished the president and the people of Djibouti success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Military Delegation Leaves for Cuba
articles.content:
DPRK Military Delegation Leaves for Cuba
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A DPRK military delegation led by Kim Kyok Sik, chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, left here on Wednesday  to visit Cuba.
					It was seen off at the airport by Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Lieut. Gen. Ryom Chol Song, KPA Col. Gen. O Kum Chol, and other KPA general officers and officers and Juan Miguel Garcia Montano, military attache of the Cuban embassy here.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held on Day of Anti-U.S Struggle
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held on Day of Anti-U.S Struggle
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces on Wednesday on the occasion of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					Present there were senior officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments, co-op farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					At the rallies speakers recalled that the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean war more than six decades ago for the sinister purpose of stifling the young DPRK and dominating the world, adding that they hurled into it huge armed forces and large quantities of destructive weapons and committed unheard-of genocide.
					
					They went on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists, however, suffered a disgraceful defeat in face of the army and people of the DPRK who turned out in their courageous struggle to honorably defend the freedom and independence of the country under the outstanding leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a due lesson from the ignominious defeat it sustained in the last Korean war, have stepped up the moves for igniting a war against the DPRK and stifling it, hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership and gravely threatening the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					It is the final conclusion made by the army and the people of the DPRK that they should settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists by force of arms. The aggressors and provokers will face merciless strikes of the Korean People's Army and come to know what a real war is like. 
					
					The rallies were followed by mammoth anti-U.S. demonstrations.

articles.title: Changgol Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Changgol Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Crowd of Visitors
Changsong, June 26 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of servicepersons, people and school youth and children are visiting the Changgol Revolutionary Site in Changsong County, North Phyongan Province with the approach of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					The revolutionary site is associated with the immortal history of revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung. In that place he laid down an operational policy for counterattack and wisely led it from late in October to early in November, Juche 39 (1950), the most grave period of the last war. 
					
					In this place the President set forth the great idea of bringing about a radical turn in the war, outstanding strategic and tactical policies and important tasks for strengthening the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					
					In a simple rural house he had meals prepared with coarse grain while taking good care of the living of soldiers of the KPA. Concerned about the difficult living conditions of people, he saw to it that the polished rice which had been reserved as strategic food was distributed among them. 
					
					The visitors went round the monument to the revolutionary activities of the President and revolutionary relics such as the house where he guided the meeting of the Political Committee of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the house where he guided meetings of officers and generals of the Supreme Command of the KPA. 
					
					The visitors posed for a long while before the simple rural house with low roof where there are a table, chair, telephone and bed, and an air-raid shelter, well and other revolutionary relics.

articles.title: Families with Strong Sense of Patriotism on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Families with Strong Sense of Patriotism on Increase in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of families in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are making painstaking efforts for the sake of the country and the people.
					When visiting the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site some days ago, respected Marshal Kim Jong Un praised the family of Kang Hye Gyong, a lecturer, for her family with a strong sense of patriotism and had a photo taken with her family members.
					
					Kang, her husband and daughter are working at the revolutionary site, a reminder of President Kim Il Sung's enduring feats in leading the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					Among others is the family of Sim Tong Su , a teacher of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, which Kim Jong Un called a praiseworthy teachers' family when visiting his new house in Changjon Street, Pyongyang, last year.
					
					On a way to field guidance, leader Kim Jong Il met Kim Song Nyo and her family members, who are road cleaners, on Kubong Pass in Jagang Province on August 31, Juche 89 (2000) and spoke highly of their devoted service for the country.
					
					Hong Yong Hwa in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang and her two sons and their wives all work as barbers, enjoying high respect from customers.
					
					Pak Kyong Nam and his sisters work at the Pongsan County Forestry Management Station in North Hwanghae Province for decades. In those years, they cultivated 150 000 saplings of larch, 80,000 saplings of pine-nut tree and other saplings of good species of trees each year.
					
					Families of Jo Ok Sun in Manpho City, Jagang Province and Choe Sang Ok in Unryul County, South Hwanghae Province are well known in the country for their good jobs for the army, the collective and society for ten odd years.

articles.title: Poster Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Poster Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A poster has been produced on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The poster calls for glorifying the immortal revolutionary feats the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory and  the indomitable fighting spirit of the army and the people of the DPRK who defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressors and honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country under his leadership.
					
					Seen in its central part are letters "Victory in Great Fatherland Liberation War", "Celebration" and "60th Anniversary" and main sculpture "Victory" of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War against the background of fireworks of jubilee.
					
					It also depicts sculptures of subsidiary themes including "Moving direct-firing artillery pieces to height" and "Assistance of people in the rear to soldiers on the front" which impressively deal with the heroic struggle of the service personnel and the people who fought to defend the country at the cost of blood.

articles.title: DPRK's Permanent Representative at UN Demands Dismantlement of "UN Forces Command" in S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK's Permanent Representative at UN Demands Dismantlement of "UN Forces Command" in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Dismantlement of the "UN Forces Command" in south Korea is an essential requirement for achieving detente and protecting peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean Peninsula.
					The permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN said this at a press conference at the UN Headquarters on June 21.
					
					Noting that upcoming July 27 marks the 60th anniversary of the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA), he said:
					
					The U.S. is holding on to the truce, defying the consistent stand and efforts of the DPRK's government for replacing the AA by a peace treaty.
					
					It seeks to use the "UN Forces Command" as a tool for a war against the DPRK, pursuant to its own defense strategy.
					
					The representative explained how the command was established, disclosing its essence. He added:
					
					It is the U.S. government, not the UN which has the authority to appoint the commander of the "UN Forces" in south Korea and it is again the U.S. government which has the decision-making power over the issues of reduction or beef-up of U.S. troops in south Korea which go under the helmet of the "UN Forces".
					
					After all, the U.S. has put its forces command in south Korea under the UN helmet by abusing the resolution of the UN Security Council. It is an ignominy of the UN that the U.S., a belligerent party of the Korean War, is still abusing the name of the "UN Forces Command", a product of anachronism.
					
					Due to the U.S., the truce mechanism was systematically broken and totally nullified at last and other mechanism which the "UN Forces Command" can have dealing with had already become defunct. Under this situation the command should be dismantled without delay.
					
					The "UN Forces Command" is a trash of the era the dismantlement of which had already been decided by the UN General Assembly.
					
					The representative answered the questions raised by reporters.
					
					Present there were media persons of China, the U.S., Japan and Europe and correspondents of various countries residing at the UN.

articles.title: UN Didn't Command Forces during Korean War: UN
articles.content:
UN Didn't Command Forces during Korean War: UN
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The deputy spokesperson of the UN Secretary General made clear on June 21 that the UN didn't command any unit during the Korean War that was fought in the 1950s.
					At a news briefing the spokesperson said the UN didn't play any role in commanding forces deployed on the Korean Peninsula, the units which conducted operations in Korea, being affiliated to the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" from 1950 to 1953, in particular.

articles.title: U.S. Has No Justification to Commemorate Korean War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Has No Justification to Commemorate Korean War: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. secretary of Defence made a "congratulatory speech" at the opening ceremony of the "Korean War Memorial" held at the building of the U.S. Department of Defence. He made much fuss, praising Korean War veterans present there as "brave soldiers." The south Korean puppet ambassador to the U.S. said that now is the time to recall the Korean War being called "forgotten war" as "forgotten victory". 
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					Lurking behind the above-said "memorial event" was a criminal attempt to occupy the whole of Korea. 
					
					The last Korean War was the first war of aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists after the Second World War, it notes, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists have no justification to commemorate the Korean War in the light of the background against which it ignited the war and its outcome. 
					
					The U.S. warmongers have never given up their attempt to invade the DPRK. 
					
					Even at this time, the U.S. is watching for a chance to provoke another Korean war of aggression after deploying its huge troops and amassing a lot of war means including nuclear weapons in the vicinity of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					The DPRK will strike every place where the U.S. forces of aggression are stationed and blow up the strongholds of aggression if they dare ignite the second Korean war. 
					
					If the U.S. bellicose forces start the war, they will sustain the bitterest defeat in their history.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to always remember the lamentable confession made by generals of the U.S. forces that the U.S. fought a wrong war with a wrong rival and in the wrong place.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Evading Responsibility for Aborted Talks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Evading Responsibility for Aborted Talks
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Ryu Kil Jae, south Korean puppet minister of Unification, in a recent special lecture made poor excuses for urging the director of the United Front Department of the north to attend the talks as chief delegate. He talked rubbish that the south side did not take issue with the status and rank of the chief delegate of the north but urged the north side to send a man who can substantially settle the pending issues between the south and the north.
					A few days later, an official of Chongwadae said something different from Ryu's remarks. This guy asserted that the south side has never put up any precondition as regards south-north dialogue and did not designate a specified man as chief delegate to the talks, blustering that the south side insisted on its assertion because in case the minister of Unification goes to the talks as chief delegate the counterpart should be on the same rank. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: What they uttered only betray the despicable attempt of the puppet group to evade the responsibility for the aborted talks.
					
					Facts go to prove that they are working hard to shift the blame for the aborted talks onto the north side at any cost and stoke bitterness toward compatriots and fan up the atmosphere of confrontation with the north in south Korea, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					However, such desperate bid of the south Korean authorities would get them nowhere.
					
					There is a limit to the patience of the north side.
					
					There is mounting domestic and foreign criticism of Ryu for aborting the talks at the instruction of Chongwadae. Much upset by this, he is now free to let loose a whole string of rhetoric to evade the blame. How miserable and poor Ryu is. 
					
					The clan of Chongwadae should bear in mind that no one would pay heed to its lies and they would only bring to light its anti-reunification nature.
					
					The south Korean authorities had better look back on their wrong doings and repent of them before making poor excuses.

articles.title: U.S. Abuses United Nations in Korean War: News Analyst
articles.content:
U.S. Abuses United Nations in Korean War: News Analyst
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- In a bid to legitimate the Korean War (June 1950 - July 1953), the United States employed the name of the United Nations in inveigling huge forces of satellite states into the war along with its forces. This was a crafty ruse unprecedented in history.
					After the end of World War II, the U.S. emerged the boss in the capitalist world, which provided a favorable condition for it to have the UN on the string.
					
					Prior to the Korean War, the U.S. State Department had already worked out a draft resolution for discussion at the UN, in order to sue the DPRK for its alleged "attack". And it even selected a country which would bring this document to the UN.
					
					The department also granted the "UN Commission on Korea" with additional right to oversee "possible conflicts" along the 38th parallel of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					After making such preparations, the U.S. submitted the draft resolution to the UN immediately after launching its invasion of the DPRK.
					
					Yielding to the U.S. pressure, the UN Security Council convened a meeting at 02:00 (local time) on June 25, 1950 and illegally adopted a resolution branding northward invasion as "southward invasion".
					
					U.S. President Truman called senior officials of the State Department and military brasshats at 19:40 (local time) to give an order on shipping munitions and fielding naval and air forces, while MacArthur set in motion the flying corps of Japan-based U.S. 5th Air Force.
					
					As the war situation went against its grain from the outset, the U.S. tried to adjust it by abusing the UN. It pressurized the UN Security Council to call a meeting at 15:00 (local time) on June 27, which led to the adoption of a resolution on rendering "assistance" to south Korea and suggesting dispatch of armed forces of satellite states.
					
					On July 7, it made sure that the UNSC adopted a resolution on organizing U.S.-led "UN Forces" to be dispatched to the Korean War.
					
					In actuality, the "UN resolution" on the Korean War had no legality, for it was adopted in the absence of the Soviet Union, a UNSC permanent member.
					
					But, Truman appointed MacArthur, commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East, as commander of the "UN Forces" on July 8 and set up the "UN Command" on July 25, thus putting the helmets of "UN Forces" on the troops of the U.S. and its 15 satellite states involved in the war
					
					The "UN Command", which has existed up till now as a hurdle to the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula, should be dismantled without delay.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Sycophancy towards U.S. Disclosed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Sycophancy towards U.S. Disclosed
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed recently that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors covered in an organized way the carcinogenic danger which was confirmed by the survey of environmental pollution in the U.S. military base in Pusan during his rule, according to the south Korean CBS on Monday.
					The results of survey of pollution at the base in 2009 showed that the carcinogenic substance beyond the tolerance limit was detected in four of 11 districts covering 160 000 phyong. 
					
					In order to conceal the fact, the then Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade, the Ministry of Defense and the Ministry of Environment tailored the survey results before announcing that just a small area was polluted in a bid to understate the environmental pollution by the U.S. forces. Moreover, the puppet authorities decided to cover expenses for de-polluting, yielding to the U.S. arbitrary practice.
					
					The recent disclosure of the group's sycophancy toward the U.S. sparked uproar among broad spectrum of people in south Korea. They are becoming vocal demanding a thoroughgoing survey of the pollution at the U.S. military base in Ryongsan, Seoul to be transferred in 2016.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation Published in S. Korea
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation Published in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Youth Solidarity of south Korea published a declaration on the situation on June 20 in protest against the Intelligence Service's interference in politics.
					The declaration said it has been fully disclosed that the IS misled public opinion in an organized way through the Psychological Information Bureau at the instruction of Won Se Hun, former director of the IS, with the approach of the 2012 "presidential election."
					
					The course of investigation into the IS's illegal interference in the election also clarified that Kim Yong Phan, former director of the Seoul District Police Agency, and the minister of Justice issued  instructions to downplay and conceal the case and ordered non-restraint investigation into Won Se Hun, it noted.
					
					The non-restraint indictment made against Won alone over such hideous crime is little short of regarding the people as scarecrow, it held.
					
					Young people are now recollecting the history in which they fought for social democracy against the dictatorial regime, it said, adding: We cannot remain a passive onlooker to the situation where democracy is being trampled down ruthlessly by government power.
					
					More than 100 000 people have signed the signature papers in four days demanding a state investigation into the IS's interference in the election, it noted, stressing the resentment of the people at the government power's organized injustice is running high.
					
					It demanded Won Se Hun and Kim Yong Phan be arrested and punished, the state investigation be made into the IS's interference in politics and the present chief executive apologize to the people.
					
					The present chief executive should bear in mind what disgraceful end the erstwhile dictatorial regimes met, it said, warning she will face stronger resistance of the people if she does not take immediate steps.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Internationalize Issue of KIZ under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Internationalize Issue of KIZ under Fire
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are seeking to bring foreign businesses into the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) under the pretext of internationalizing its issue. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined article in this regard: 
					This is a reckless action of those keen on dependence on outsiders, sycophancy and treachery to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					The article goes on:
					
					The issue of inter-Korean relations is a domestic matter in every aspect. It, therefore, can never be an issue to be internationalized.
					
					Such sinister attempt to internationalize the issue of the inter-Korean relations is little short of an act of making a mockery of the will of all Koreans to firmly preserve the common denominator of the Korean nation formed and developed for a long historical period and reunify the nation independently.
					
					The will, wishes and interests of the Korean nation are the absolute standards which must be applied to the inter-Korean ties. 
					
					What the south Korean puppet regime is seeking in its efforts to internationalize the inter-Korean ties is nothing but an open declaration of its intention to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. It is, at the same time, an unpardonable criminal act to stifle the fellow countrymen in collaboration with outsiders.
					
					Such action is also a reckless one of violating the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					In order to mend the bedeviled inter-Korean ties it is necessary for the south Korean puppet regime to stand for respecting the idea of "By our nation itself!"
					
					As long as the regime sticks to the viewpoint and stance of depending on foreign forces, it is quite impossible to save the inter-Korean relations from catastrophe, much less realizing dialogue and cooperation among fellow countrymen.
					
					If the regime persists in its moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots, pursuant to its aim to internationalize the inter-Korean relations, it will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Reckless Saber-rattling
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Reckless Saber-rattling
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- "Hukryong" unit of the south Korean puppet Marine Corps announced it would stage a tactical drill on Paekryong Island Tuesday, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					The warmongers are mulling hurling huge forces, artillery pieces, armored cars for landing and other attack weapons into the drill which will last till June 28 for the purpose of helping soldiers get familiar with combat procedures and examining the capability for carrying out operational plans.
					
					They are becoming all more pronounced in their war moves to spark another war by staging such war drills on islands in the West Sea of Korea, the biggest hotspots.

articles.title: S. Korean Praises North at Trial
articles.content:
S. Korean Praises North at Trial
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A south Korean resident praised the DPRK at a trial held in the Chongju District Court on June 21, stunning it. 
					He was indicted on charges of the violation of the "Security Law." He was accused of posting on his website articles introducing and lauding the DPRK from July 2009 to March 2011.
					
					At the court the resident stood firm for his assertion. He shouted "Long Live the Democratic People's Republic of Korea!" at hearings whenever he was sentenced to prison terms, making the fascist authorities panic-stricken.
					
					Much upset by this, the judicial authorities staged a trial of him by invoking the fascist law this time, too, but when he was sentenced to imprisonment, he again shouted at the top of his voice "Long Live the great  DPRK!", striking terror into the hearts of the puppet group.
					
					This goes to clearly prove that no fascist crackdown can ever dampen the longing for the DPRK and the desire for achieving reunification through alliance with it growing stronger among the south Korean people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Various events took place in Russia to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					A floral basket was laid before the monument to Kim Jong Il's visit to the Bureya Hydro-electric Plant with due ceremony, the opening of a Korean book and fine art exhibition was held  in Amursk District of Khabarovsk Territory and a meeting in Sankt-Peterburg on June 11 and 19.
					
					After laying a floral basket before the monument, the acting manager of the Bureya Hydro-electric Plant said:
					
					The employees of the plant always remember Kim Jong Il's visit to it on Aug. 21, 2011. 
					
					The monument erected to mark the first anniversary of his visit to Siberia and Far East Region of the Russian Federation will shine forever with the history of the plant. 
					
					The chief executive of Amursk District of Khabarovsk Territory said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries are steadily developing. 
					
					The chairman of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works said that he grew up in the crucible of the anti-Japanese revolutionary war and the Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War). 
					
					Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution to one victory after another with his outstanding leadership ability despite all ordeals and difficulties, the chairman said, adding:
					
					It was the biggest exploit performed by him that he turned the DPRK into the powerful socialist bulwark, a nuclear weapons state and a satellite manufacturer and launcher the like of which is a few in the world. 
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un has led the Korean revolution to victory by carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					He is invariably holding high the slogan "We Serve the People!" true to the intention of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Papers of various countries featured articles to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The Russian paper Nakhodkinski Rabochi on June 19 carried an article titled "The party which achieved unity and cohesion". It noted that he developed the WPK into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and the mother party which serves the people.
					
					The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on June 18 noted in an article titled "The eternal general secretary of the WPK":
					
					The idea and line of General Secretary Kim Jong Il have served as eternal guidelines for the WPK.
					
					His theory of Songun politics, in particular, is shedding its rays as an invincible banner which makes it possible for the country and nation to defend their sovereignty without fail and the popular masses to thoroughly preserve their independence despite the undisguised high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists.
					
					L' Avenir, the paper of Democratic Congo, on the same day carried an article. It said:
					
					Kim Jong Il, who regarded the people's happiness as his greatest pleasure, created the history of love for them.
					
					Thanks to his rare political caliber and leadership art, the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark of Korea's reunification, was adopted.
					
					The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is creditably carrying forward Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven and Songun politics.
					
					He is possessed of outstanding military qualifications, prominent leadership art and matchless pluck.
					
					The DPRK will eternally prosper and surely achieve national reunification under his leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in  Party Building Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party Building Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Democratic Congo, Pakistan and Ethiopia in the period from June 13 to 15 to mark the 49th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					The vice-chairman and secretary general of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence and strengthened the unity and cohesion of the whole party and society in every way through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities. 
					
					He authored a lot of works proving the validity and invincibility of socialism, firmly defending socialism under the banner of Songun and instilling confidence of victory into the Korean people and other revolutionary people of the world, they added. 
					
					The secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, reporter and other speakers said that the development of the WPK is entirely ascribable to the exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Endowed with gifted wisdom, noble virtues and distinguished leadership, he developed the WPK into a veteran and tested party victoriously leading the revolution and construction in any adversity and trial and strengthened the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks, the secretary general said, and went on:
					
					His exploits for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, socialism and global independence will always go down in history. 
					
					A message of greeting to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Papers of various countries carried special write-ups to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					La Prosperite, a paper of Democratic Congo, on June 12 devoted its one full page to various articles including "June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, landmark of Korea's reunification" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The Nepali paper Charcha on June 10 carried an article titled "Echo on June 15" with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The publication of the joint declaration aroused firm support and strong response not only among the Koreans but of the international community and brought about a dramatic turn in implementing the cause of Korea's reunification, the paper noted, adding:
					
					Such remarkable development in the inter-Korean relations was a shining fruition of the joint declaration in which the north and the south promised to achieve the country's reunification and co-prosperity of the nation in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					Nepal Today on June 13 carried similar articles.
					
					The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on June 6 noted that the adoption of the joint declaration brought about a fresh phase on the road of Korea's reunification and injected vitality into the reunification movement.
					
					The Indian paper Tourism Era on June 11 criticized the south Korean Lee Myung Bak's regime for chilling the June 15 era of reunification full of dynamism and bringing back the inter-Korean relations to the phase of confrontation and war.  It also chided the present chief executive of south Korea for blocking even the cooperation undertakings between NGOs, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					The Indonesian paper The First Times on June 12 noted the present situation on the Korean Peninsula proves that the north and the south of Korea can advance toward peace and reunification when they support and carry out their June 15 joint declaration, whereas its negation will only lead to confrontation and war.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by Serbian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by Serbian Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- We will dynamically conduct diverse solidarity movement supporting the DPRK and denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia noted this in his statement on June 20 with the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle as an occasion.
					
					This year significantly marks the 60th anniversary of the victory the Korean people won in the three-year Fatherland Liberation War by defeating U.S. imperialism, he said, adding:
					
					The Korean people defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country by winning the war and the U.S. could not but bend its knees before the then young DPRK.
					
					Far from drawing a lesson from its bitter defeat, the U.S. is looking for a chance to reinvade the DPRK while deploying in south Korea huge aggression forces and various types of latest war hardware.
					
					The U.S. will meet bitterer defeat in case it dares ignite the second Korean War, oblivious of its past lesson.
					
					The DPRK is winning victory after victory under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un by foiling all sorts of challenges and moves to stifle it on the part of the U.S. and its satellite forces. The DPRK stands tall like a strong fortress of independence, encouraging the progressives.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party, Organization Urge U.S. to Respond to DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party, Organization Urge U.S. to Respond to DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue
Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a joint statement on June 19 in support of the crucial statement of the spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					The statement recalled that the NDC in its statement on June 16 clarified the DPRK's principled stand for denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula and proposed high-level talks with the U.S.
					
					Noting the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula spawned by the U.S. which has resorted to moves against the DPRK for decades, the statement said:
					
					The main architect of the escalated tensions on the peninsula is also the U.S. which runs amuck to provoke a war against the DPRK, having introduced nuclear strike means into south Korea.
					
					The DPRK proposed high-level talks by making a bold decision and showing good faith.
					
					The U.S. will have to take a responsible choice as a main culprit which caused the nuclear issue on the peninsula and has escalated the tensions.
					
					Fully supporting the sincere proposal of the DPRK, we urge the U.S. to respond to it immediately.

articles.title: Delegado coreano urge disolucion de "comandancia de fuerzas de ONU" en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Delegado coreano urge disolucion de "comandancia de fuerzas de ONU" en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU insistio en que el desmantelamiento de la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" estacionada en el Sur de Corea es la demanda imprescindible para aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region de Asia-Pacifico y preservar la paz y seguridad de la misma region. 
					En una rueda de prensa concedida el dia 21 en la sede de la ONU, dijo que el 27 de julio se cumplen los 60 anos desde cuando se firmo el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea. 
					
					EE.UU. mantiene el estado de armisticio en Corea dando espaldas a la invariable posicion y esfuerzos del gobierno de la RPDC por sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el otro de paz, revelo y agrego que segun su estrategia de defensa, EE.UU. intenta utilizar la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" como aparato de la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC. 
					
					Revelo el proceso y esencia de la fabricacion de la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" y continuo:
					
					La autoridad de nombrar al comandante de las "fuerzas de la ONU" la tiene el gobierno estadounidense. Y la reduccion o aumento de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea, disfrazadas como "fuerzas de la ONU", tambien se decide por el gobierno norteamericano. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, EE.UU. utiliza todavia el nombre de la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" como una parte beligerante de la pasada guerra coreana, abusando de la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					Esto es una verguenza de la ONU y actitud anacronica. 
					
					Debido a EE.UU., se ha destruido y anulado sistematicamente el aparato de armisticio y ya desaparecieron las instituciones con posibilidades de contactarse con la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU". 
					
					En tal circunstancia, hay que ser desmantelada sin demora la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU", considerada como una basura de la epoca y condenada a desintegracion por la Asamblea General de la ONU. 
					
					Luego, el representante coreano respondio a las preguntas de los reporteros. 
					
					En esa entrevista participaron los comunicadores de China, Estados Unidos, Japon y los paises europeos, y los corresponsales de diferentes paises en la ONU.

articles.title: ONU no mando ninguna unidad en pasada guerra coreana, senala funcionario de ONU
articles.content:
ONU no mando ninguna unidad en pasada guerra coreana, senala funcionario de ONU
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz interino del secretario general de la ONU dijo el dia 21 que esta organizacion multinacional no mando ninguna unidad militar durante la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953).
					En una reunion informativa, el afirmo que la ONU no desempeno ningun papel en mandar las fuerzas armadas desplegadas en la Peninsula Coreana, en particular, en dirigir las unidades adscritas a la "comandancia combinada" que cumplieron operaciones en la pasada guerra coreana en ese trienio.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a presidente de Jibuti
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a presidente de Jibuti
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Jibuti, Ismail Omar Guelleh, con motivo del 36o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					El remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo exitos en sus labores para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Parte hacia Cuba delegacion militar de RPDC
articles.content:
Parte hacia Cuba delegacion militar de RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- La delegacion militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por el jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Kyok Sik, partio el dia 26 de esta capital para visitar la Republica de Cuba.
					En el aeropuerto despidieron la delegacion el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Jang Jong Nam, el teniente general del EPC Ryom Chol Song, el coronel general del EPC O Kum Chol y otros generales y oficiales del EPC, asi como el agregado militar de Cuba en Corea, Juan Miguel Garcia Montano.

articles.title: EE.UU. abusa de la etiqueta de ONU en guerra coreana
articles.content:
EE.UU. abusa de la etiqueta de ONU en guerra coreana
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- El imperialismo norteamericano abuso del nombre de la ONU para movilizar en la pasada guerra coreana muchas fuerzas armadas de su pais y sus satelites y justificar esta incorporacion.
					Hasta ahora habla como si esos mercenarios hubieran combatido por la "libertad" y la "paz".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una farsa para encubrir sus crimenes y justificarlos.
					
					Despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el imperio se convirtio en el cabecilla del mundo capitalista y esa posicion le facilito despachar fuerzas armadas de paises satelites al frente coreano.
					
					Antes de inicio de la guerra, ya se elaborado en la seccion de seguridad politica del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. el proyecto de resolucion para remitir a la ONU el tema del supuesto "ataque del Norte de Corea".
					
					Por otra parte, preparo al que presentaria oficialmente a la ONU sus documentos.
					
					Ademas, el Departamento de Estado decidio conceder a la "comision de la ONU para Corea" el derecho adicional a vigilar el "estatus de seguridad" en el paralelo 38o de la Peninsula Coreana e "informar todo el proceso del eventual peligro de conflicto armado".
					
					Asi preparo todas las condiciones para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de cualquier choque militar por conducto de la organizacion oficial de la ONU.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que acepto la demanda de bandido de EE.UU., convoco una reunion a las 2 de la madrugada (hora de EE.UU.) del 25 de junio de 1950 y adopto una resolucion ilegal calificando la guerra coreana de "invasion del Norte (de Corea)" al Sur.
					
					A las 7:40 de la tarde del mismo dia, el entonces presidente estadounidense Truman ordeno a todos los cabecillas del Departamento de Estado y la capa militar la ayuda de municiones y la movilizacion de fuerzas navales y aereas mientras MacArthur dio la orden de despegue a las aviaciones de la quinta fuerza aerea acampada en Japon.
					
					Cuando su agresion militar, se enfrento desde el principio con el fuerte contraataque del EPC, convoco por la fuerza otra reunion del Consejo de Seguridad a las 3 de la tarde del 27 de junio para adoptar la resolucion de brindar "apoyo" al Sur de Corea y "permitir" la injerencia militar de los Estados satelites.
					
					Con el objetivo de ampliar la invasion armada, el imperio organizo el 7 de julio las "fuerzas de la ONU" bajo el patrocinio de tropas norteamericanas e hizo aprobar la resolucion de movilizarlas en la guerra coreana.
					
					Esa resolucion fue invalida desde el principio porque fue aprobada en ausencia de la ex URSS, miembro permanente de esa instancia de la ONU.
					
					Pero, Truman instalo el 25 de julio la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU" despues de designar el 8 de julio a MacArthur como comandante.
					
					De esa manera, las tropas yanquis y las otras de 15 paises satelites participaron en la guerra coreana bajo el rotulo de "fuerzas de la ONU".
					
					Hay que ser disuelta inmediatamente la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU", que fue organizada como aparato para la materializacion del intento agresivo de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y obstaculiza hasta ahora el fin del estado de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: ACNC censura ambicion de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC censura ambicion de hegemonia mundial de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- Se confirmo recientemente el hecho de que la mayoria de las bases de infanteria de marina de Estados Unidos en ultramar esta concentrada en Okinawa, Japon. 
					Segun el "informe de estructuracion de bases" del ano fiscal 2012 del Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos, publicado por medios extranjeros, 15 de las 20 bases de infantes de marina de EE.UU. en ultramar  estan en Japon y 13 de ellas, en Okinawa.
					
					Esta cifra es una prueba de la siniestra intencion del imperio de mantener y fortalecer su dominio militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico, mantener a raya a los rivales potenciales y realizar a toda costa su ambicion de dominar el mundo entero. 
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. hizo esfuerzos desesperados por establecer su dominio sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico considerandola como uno de los puntos importantes para defender sus intereses. 
					
					De ahi que lanzo hace mas de 60 anos la invasion armada contra la RPDC recien fundada entonces, y en el tiempo posbelico, convirtio el Sur de Corea en el mayor arsenal nuclear y a Japon, en la base avanzada y de logistica para el cumplimiento de la guerra de agresion. 
					
					En el nuevo siglo, perfecciono el sistema de mando y la combatividad de su infanteria de marina y otras tropas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea y Japon acorde con su estrategia de guerra nuclear. 
					
					La aventura militar de EE.UU. en esta region entra en etapa crucial cuando Obama publico bruscamente la estrategia de trasladar enfoque a la region de Asia-Pacifico y se llevan a cabo la reorganizacion y reubicacion de las tropas y los ejercicios de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Lo problematico es que EE.UU. describe el traslado de sus fuerzas armadas en ultramar a la region de Asia-Pacifico y sus maniobras belicas como un movimiento para el "aseguramiento de equilibrio". 
					
					EE.UU. fijo algunos paises regionales como enemigos potenciales y reales y justifica su estrategia calificando el desarrollo y el aumento de la capacidad militar de esos paises como "cambios en el equilibrio regional". 
					
					Ya antes de publicar la estrategia en cuestion, EE.UU. emplazo en Asia-Pacifico sus enormes fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Si el imperio tiene interes en el equilibrio, ha de reducir en gran medida sus bases militares y pertrechos nucleares emplazados en la region, en lugar de aumentarlos. 
					
					Ahora los altos funcionarios de EE.UU. dicen que su estrategia concedera mayor peso a la cooperacion economica, pero esto no pasa de ser una artimana para relajar la vigilancia de los paises regionales. 
					
					La estrategia norteamericana tiene la meta de formar el cerco militar sobre los paises regionales. 
					
					Todos los hechos comprueban que se torna cada vez mas abierta y peligrosa la ambicion de EE.UU. de tomar la hegemonia mundial comenzando por controlar la region de Asia-Pacifico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de Sur de Corea para internacionalizar ZIK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras de Sur de Corea para internacionalizar ZIK
Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- Las maniobras de las autoridades surcoreanas para introducir las fuerzas extranjeras en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong so pretexto de la "internacionalizacion de la ZIK" constituyen una accion conflictiva de los enloquecidos en la dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas y el servilismo a las grandes potencias.
					Asi comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 26 y continua:
					
					El tema de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur es el propio de la nacion, razon por la cual no se puede ser el objeto de internacionalizacion.
					
					Tales maniobras son el insulto a la voluntad de los coreanos de defender firmemente la identidad de la nacion formulada y desarrollada durante largas trayectorias historicas y de realizar de modo independiente la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La norma absoluta a ser aplicada en las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas es la voluntad, la demanda y el interes de la nacion.
					
					Por eso, las actuales maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos son una abierta declaracion de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y un acto criminal encaminado a realizar la ambicion de aplastar a sus connacionales en contubernio con las agresivas fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Tambien, devienen una locura anti-reunificacion contraria al espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Para mejorar las relaciones N-S en estado catastrofica, no hay que internacionalizar sino tomar una posicion de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Mientras las autoridades surcoreanas no se liberen del punto de vista y la posicion de caracter dependiente y servil, no podran pensar en el dialogo ni en las cooperaciones ni evitar el estado catastrofico de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Si ellas siguen recurriendo a la internacionalizacion de las relaciones N-S y la confrontacion fratricida, recaera sobre si mismas  la responsabilidad de todas las consecuencias.
